name: Ze Field
description:
*** For best experience please use a downloadable version ***

Made in a week for Puzzle Jam [8 Bits to Infinity] for which the theme was Black & White. Made in Unity 2019.1.5f. 

Programming by lilou_cormic

Design and art by Hamsterspit
